view.name: AV_Find_stamopl_for_barn_fra_cpr
view.queryOriginal: SELECT * FROM WA00100T WHERE KOMNR = 250 and PNRINSTB = '010110-5121'
view.description: Find stamoplysninger for barnet ud fra cpr-nummer.(OBS. resten af oplysninger hentes via P-data snitflade, så som adresse mv.)

view.name: AV_Find_barns_forældre_fra_cpr
view.queryOriginal: SELECT B.PNRINSTB AS BARN,c.BESKRIV as RELATION ,b.PNRRELAT FROM WA43800T B INNER JOIN WA03000T C on (C.KOMNR = B.KOMNR AND C.STATPROL =B.STATPROL) Where c.STATPROL in (1,2) and B.PNRINSTB = '010508-5052'
view.description: Find forældre til barnet ud fra cpr-nummer.

view.name: AV_Find_notater_tilkn_barn_fra_cpr
view.queryOriginal: select 'Intern kommentar og notat' as Notattype, KOMNR,null as SAGID,JOURNR,TEKSTGRP,HÆNDDATO,LBNNR,USERID,TIMESTAM,TEKSTLIN,CMARK from WA42200T where JOURNR ='3105640802' union select 'notat tilknyttet institutionsbruger' as Notattype, KOMNR,null as SAGID,JOURNR,TEKSTGRP,HÆNDDATO,LBNNR,USERID,TIMESTAM,TEKSTLIN,CMARK from WA42200A where JOURNR ='3105640802' Union select 'Notater tilknyttet journal' as Notattype, KOMNR,SAGID,JOURNR,TEKSTGRP,HÆNDDATO,LBNNR,USERID,TIMESTAM,TEKSTLIN,CMARK from WA42200B where JOURNR ='3105640802'
view.description: Find notater tilknyttet barnet ud fra cpr-nummer. (JOURNR=CPRNR formatet er('0101012222')

view.name: AV_Find_institution
view.queryOriginal: --INSTITUTION SELECT INSTNR, DISTRIKTNR FROM WA00200T WHERE KOMNR = 157 AND INSTNR = 57 AND DISTRIKTNR IS NOT NULL;

view.name: AV_Find_dagplejedistrikt
view.queryOriginal: SELECT A.DISTRIKTNR FROM WA01100T A INNER JOIN WA41700T B ON B.KOMNR = A.KOMNR AND B.KODGRUP = A.KODGRUP WHERE A.KOMNR = 157 AND B.INSTNR = 182 AND A.DISTRIKTNR IS NOT NULL

view.name: AV_Find_dagplejerstamoplysninger
view.queryOriginal: SELECT * FROM WA30000T WHERE KOMNR = 157 AND PNRRELAT = '270968-0091' OR INSTNR = 22
